summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers, District Lodge 160, Local 79, authorizing execution of a Memorandum of Understanding effective January 1, 2005 through December 31, 2005 and a three-year Collective Bargaining Agreement effective January 1, 2006 through December 31, 2008 between the City of Seattle and the International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers, District Lodge160, Local 79, and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
